Blends colors using logical OR

Alias for SG_PEN_FLAG_IS_BLEND

SG_PEN_FLAG_IS_INVERT

SG_PEN_FLAG_IS_XOR 

Alias for SG_PEN_FLAG_IS_INVERT

SG_PEN_FLAG_IS_ERASE 

Erases the colors that are set in the pen (logical AND of inverse color)

SG_PEN_FLAG_IS_AND 

Alias for SG_PEN_FLAG_IS_ERASE

SG_PEN_FLAG_IS_FILL 

When drawing vector icons, this flag enables fill points specified by the icon
